short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up highlighted text on wikipedia.  Just highlight the word or phrase you want to look up and press Ctrl+I.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple open-source chrome extension that allows you to look up terms on wikipedia by highlighting text on any page and then hitting Ctrl+I (Command+I on apple).
